entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @News24 Mr President @CyrilRamaphosa currently people affected by coronavirus have medical aids and can selfquarantine. Our people in squatter camps/taxis/trains/buses won't afford medical aid/selfquarantine. May you please declare lockdown to contain spread of coronavirus @DrZweliMkhize
